value.title: Best kept SECRET in Power BI??? You tell us!
value.excerpt: Have we found the best kept SECRET in Power BI? Adam saw this recently and was BLOWN away! Zooming in can help with presenting in business settings and anywhere else. Here are a few things you can use to make that presentation better with Power BI.  ZoomIt:  https://docs.microsoft.com/sysinternals/downloads/zoomit

value.title: Brand your Report Server

value.title: Build Your Personal Brand: 3 things with Steve Jones
value.excerpt: Are you curious how you can build your personal brand? In this video, we talk with Steve Jones, from SQL Server Central and Redgate, about 3 things you can start working on today to build your personal brand.  Connect with Steve Jones! value.title: Bulk Assign Licenses in Office 365
value.excerpt: You may need to assign an O365 License to multiple users.  I show you how to do a bulk assign to multiple users.  With looking at the upcoming Power BI GA, this may be handy for assigning multiple Free licenses to your users, or Pro licenses.  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Can I use the audit log if I'm a Power BI Admin?

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions

value.title: Capture a Profiler trace for Power BI Desktop!
value.excerpt: I look at how you can capture a Profiler trace for Power BI Desktop.  We have a child process of Analysis Services that hosts the data model.  You can connect Profiler to it and trace what is going on.  SQL 2014 SP1 Management Tools http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=46697  Process

value.title: Case of the Broken Power BI Incremental Refresh
value.excerpt: Are you using Power BI incremental refresh? Have you had it not work even though you set everything up? value.title: COPPA, a break and training  | Channel Update - November 2019
value.excerpt: Giving everyone an update on the Guy in a Cube Channel. How COPPA is affecting the channel. A break for 2019 to gear up for 2020 and more training to come!
